comments.author: shasan
comments.body: Quote from: FrancisRasputin on February 12, 2023, 02:51:35 AMhey deleted their telegram accounts of chatting with me, however, I was prescient enough to record them. I could not read the full story while I saw this. The main problem happened with relying on Telegram. Telegram accounts can be deleted and more important thing is that telegram messages can be deleted. So, o one should rely on telegram discussion. Also at the same time, there are a lot of users who appear in the guise of others.

comments.author: Hispo
comments.body: Quote from: shasan on February 12, 2023, 03:03:36 AMQuote from: FrancisRasputin on February 12, 2023, 02:51:35 AMhey deleted their telegram accounts of chatting with me, however, I was prescient enough to record them. I could not read the full story while I saw this. The main problem happened with relying on Telegram. Telegram accounts can be deleted and more important thing is that telegram messages can be deleted. So, o one should rely on telegram discussion. Also at the same time, there are a lot of users who appear in the guise of others.I do not even know why anyone would delete a thread to conceal information, it takes a relatively experienced user to know how to search for the archive version of OP's post. I took a look at it, it was a text wall a bout 23 Bitcoins being "blocked" or something, I did not read it entirely.I'd recommend to lock this thread, since serves no purpose.

comments.author: shasan
comments.body: Quote from: Hispo on February 12, 2023, 03:46:51 AMI do not even know why anyone would delete a thread to conceal informationProbably Op tried to blame someone and later came to understand that Op has no proof so there will have no solution.Quote from: Hispo on February 12, 2023, 03:46:51 AM it takes a relatively experienced user to know how to search for the archive version of OP's post. I took a look at it, it was a text wall a bout 23 Bitcoins being "blocked" or something, I did not read it entirely.You are right you can read the full post from https://ninjastic.space/search?author=FrancisRasputin&topic_id=5439529Quote from: Hispo on February 12, 2023, 03:46:51 AMI'd recommend to lock this thread, since serves no purpose.You are right there is no need to unlock the topic. @Op please lock the topic if you do not want to update.

comments.author: Alisha-k
comments.body: Why would you make a post only to end up retrieving it??Was it getting negative feedbacks?You should know this is a public space and everyone's opinion can't sit well with you.

comments.author: Daltonik
comments.body: Quote from: shasan on February 12, 2023, 04:03:23 AMQuote from: Hispo on February 12, 2023, 03:46:51 AMI do not even know why anyone would delete a thread to conceal informationProbably Op tried to blame someone and later came to understand that Op has no proof so there will have no solution.Quote from: Hispo on February 12, 2023, 03:46:51 AM it takes a relatively experienced user to know how to search for the archive version of OP's post. I took a look at it, it was a text wall a bout 23 Bitcoins being "blocked" or something, I did not read it entirely.You are right you can read the full post from https://ninjastic.space/search?author=FrancisRasputin&topic_id=5439529Quote from: Hispo on February 12, 2023, 03:46:51 AMI'd recommend to lock this thread, since serves no purpose.You are right there is no need to unlock the topic. @Op please lock the topic if you do not want to update.I read the cry of the soul on your link, if you can say what kind of gambling addict the OP actually is, as he himself says about his loss of 23 BTC, after blocking the account, which he himself asked for. But there he claims that he saved all the records, although he did not present anything, I do not know if there will be a denouement of this story, maybe he is gathering his thoughts, if not, then the OP should block the thread.

comments.author: worldofcoins
comments.body: Quote from: Alisha-k on February 13, 2023, 04:16:44 PMWhy would you make a post only to end up retrieving it??Was it getting negative feedbacks?You should know this is a public space and everyone's opinion can't sit well with you.Since passed many years of experience with bitcointalk. I have never seen any redacted posts. So I don't know why OP has deleted this post. OP must not conceal information by deleting the thread. It might create a harmful impact on other users.
